title: Shocking moment a KIA speeds down a Russian road
text:
A driver with a child passenger tried to squeeze through a tight gap between two cars - but was flipped on to its side.

In dashcam footage, taken by another vehicle, the grey KIA tries to pass an SUV on the road in Saint Petersburg, Russia.

It then accelerates into the middle lane to miss a vehicle pulling out.

A driver with a child passenger tries to squeeze through a tight gap between two cars - but is flipped on to its side in Saint Petersburg, Russia

But it misjudges the space between a white sedan and a BMW X5, and clips the latter.

The KIA is then rapidly flipped onto the driver's side door.

The speed of the collision saw the KIA skid along the road before hitting a Mitsubishi which brakes to try to avoid it.

The KIA misjudges the space between a white sedan and a BMW X5, and clips the latter, sending it onto its side

The KIA then comes to a stop in the middle of the lane before teetering dangerously on its side.

The other cars on the road come to a stop after the shocking accident, as debris can be seen scattered on the tarmac.

There was a child in the KIA, but it has been reported that no one was hurt as passengers raced to help.
description: The grey KIA tries to pass a BMW X5 on the road in Saint Petersburg, Russia. It misjudges the space between a white sedan and the SUV and clips the latter sending the KIA onto its side.
